page.title: 09HUMSHAUGH TOURISM
page.content: BECAUSE OF THE CLIMATE WE GET A HARDIER TOURIST BUT VISITORS FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD COME TO CHESTERS ROMAN WALL AND FORT THROUGHOUT THE YEAR, PERHAPS STAYING TO ENJOY THE HOTEL'S COUNTRY CLUB FACILITIES OR FOOD. EXECUTIVES MAY PREFER TO ENTERTAIN IN A PEACEFUL COUNTRY SETTING AND HELI- COPTERS CAN LAND IN THE ADJOINING FIELD. VISITORS COME IN PRIVATE COACH PARTIES, BY{ROMAN WALL}BUS, CAR, CYCLING OR{ WALKING,}SINGLY, SMALL GROUPS OR PARTIES. THIS BRINGS INCREASED SALES IN CONFECTIONERY AND LOCAL ITEMS OF HONEY, STRAWBERRIES OR POTTERY. THERE IS{GAME SHOOTING,}DEER STALKING AND{PONY CLUB}EVENTS. SEVERAL COTTAGES IN THE AREA HAVE BEEN RENOVATED, THEN LET ON A HOLIDAY BASIS AND THE LOCAL INN PROVIDES BED AND BREAKFAST ACCOMMODATION.
